function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased speed of communication mediums leading to rapid spread of misinformation about diseases.","Impact":"Misinformation can lead to panic, wrong treatment, and distrust in healthcare professionals.","Mitigation":"Fact-checking and verification of information before dissemination. Education on identifying credible sources and information.","Technologies":"AI and machine learning for automated fact-checking and verification. Social media platforms for education and awareness campaigns.","People":"General public, healthcare professionals, policymakers.","Owner":"Health organizations, educational institutions, governments."},{"Description":"Collaboration in new ways leading to the spread of unverified research findings or unreliable data.","Impact":"Unverified research findings can lead to misinformed decisions and ineffective public health strategies.","Mitigation":"Establishing clear guidelines for collaborative research. Peer review and validation of research findings.","Technologies":"Online collaborative platforms with built-in validation systems. Data analysis and visualization tools for verifying research data.","People":"Researchers, policymakers, public health officials.","Owner":"Research institutions, academic organizations, governments."},{"Description":"Intersection of sonic and textual outputs leading to the misinterpretation of research findings or communication of inaccurate information.","Impact":"Misinterpretation and miscommunication can lead to misunderstandings about research findings and recommendations.","Mitigation":"Providing detailed explanations and context with sonic and textual outputs. Utilizing multiple channels for dissemination of research findings.","Technologies":"Audio editing tools for clear and precise editing. Data visualization tools for presenting textual information.","People":"Researchers, media professionals, general public.","Owner":"Research institutions, media organizations, educational institutions."}]}
